content.rendered:
[vc_row css=”.vc_custom_1476023831779{margin-top: 80px !important;}”][vc_column width=”1/2″ el_class=”.font-change”][vc_custom_heading text=”Professional SEO Services” font_container=”tag:h1|font_size:40px|text_align:left|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_custom_heading text=”SEO Services that Grow Traffic and Increase Revenue” font_container=”tag:h5|font_size:16px|text_align:left|color:__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes”][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text el_class=”.font-change”]What We Do in Search Engine Optimization:

• Finding and optimizing the right keyword(s) and their placement is key for searching your website on the Internet.
• SEO (Search Engine Optimization) is an organic way to increase the ranking of your site.
• We select the keywords that are relevant to your business and increase your presence online.[/vc_column_text][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_column_text el_class=”.font-change”]How Can We Assist in Professional SEO Services?

• Site analysis and optimization
• Images and link optimization
• Keyword identification (Most important)
• Competitor analysis
• Off-Page Optimization (backlinks) Consultancy
• Providing tips & tricks and things to avoid, for better SEO.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10364″ img_size=”full” add_caption=”yes” alignment=”center”][vc_empty_space height=”40px”][vc_column_text]Our custom Professional SEO Services offer an analysis, strategy, forecast, project plan, and key performance indicators to improve your visibility on Search Engines. If you want business growth & reach genuine customers, SEO, or search engine optimization is the best strategy for you.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”What is SEO?” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_column_text]SEO is an acronym that stands for Search Engine Optimization, which is the process of optimizing your website to get organic, or un-paid, traffic from the search engine results page.

In other words, SEO meaning involves making certain changes to your website design and content that makes your site more attractive to a search engine. You do this in hopes that the search engine will display your website as a top result on the search engine results page.

Though SEO meaning and SEO marketing can seem complex due to the different factors that can impact your ranking, the process for search engine optimization is easier than it appears to be.

Search engines want to provide the best service for their users. This means delivering results on the search engine pages that are not only high quality but also relevant to what the searcher is looking for.

In order to do this, search engines will scan, or crawl, different websites to better understand what the site is about. This helps them deliver more relevant results to those who are searching for certain topics or keywords.

Similarly, the search engines will scan the site to determine how easy it is to navigate and read, rewarding user-friendly sites with higher rankings on the search engine results page.[/vc_column_text][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_single_image image=”10502″ img_size=”full” alignment=”center”][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Why does it work?” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_column_text]

  • Simple! It targets the users that are most likely to convert on your website and takes them there.
  • A custom SEO campaign of our SEO agency targets on-page and off-page SEO, which includes activities like keyword research and content implementation, to help your most valuable audience find you on one click!!
  • Not only that, but our exclusive team of SEO experts analyzes the performance of your business’s SEO strategy to ensure that your campaign is performing at its best.

[/vc_column_text][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_column_text]

Why Choose Digital Consulting Pandit as an SEO Agency?

[/vc_column_text][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Dedicated SEO Professionals

Single point of contact to manage your project & we understand your unique needs.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Extreme customer focus

We are building a culture of extreme customer focus.
[/vc_column][vc_column width=”1/3″]

Transparent reporting

We maintain full transparency so you can see how our SEO service increases your online revenue.
[/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”FAQs” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_toggle title=”What is Organic SEO?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]The term “organic SEO” or “organic search engine optimization” refers to the organic techniques used to gain top search rankings on search engines like Google, Bing, and Yahoo. The word organic is used to define among non-paid methods of SEO and the paid methods of SEO i.e PPC.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”Why is SEO important in 2020?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]Today most of us use Google to search for any help. So, it indicates that making your business available on Google search is the most important and easy way to connect with your customers. So, SEO still matters in 2020, though many of the practices and methods have changed. To stay ahead in the digital race, your business website needs to be technically perfect, easy-to-use & user friendly, and most important it should have optimized content based on search intent rather than keywords.[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What Does an SEO Agency Do?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]A good professional SEO company should typically include the following in its professional SEO Services:

  • Outline objectives
  • Website structure analysis & Audit your site
  • Website content analysis, including conversion rate analysis
  • Off-page online analysis
  • Optimization of website code and structure
  • Optimization of onsite content
  • Optimization of off-page factors
  • Monitor results & Provide Report on results

[/vc_toggle][/vc_column_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/2″][vc_toggle title=”How SEO works?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]

SEO is a long term process. We do SEO to secure top rank for our website for the targeted search term. SEO works with search engines so we have to understand how search engines work.
Search engines are work in 3 steps:

 Step 1: Crawling the website pages

 Step 2: Indexing of page in a search engine database for the targeted keyword

 Step 3: Ranking the most relevant page for the targeted keyword

 SEO works in two methods:

 On-page SEO: In this method, actual website page content is optimized with a particular set of targeted keywords

 Off-page SEO: In off-page SEO all link building activities are carried out for domain authority & website traffic improvement. Both are the most important parameters for achieving the top ranking with the targeted keywords.

[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”How SEO helps in business?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]Every business needs some kind of online exposure because that’s where the world is headed today. And if your business doesn’t catch up then you will stay behind in this digital race.

Here’s how SEO can help you in the long run…

  • Drive relevant organic search traffic or targeted audience
  • Helps your brand achieve higher visibility and more exposure on Search engine like Goggle, Bing, Yahoo & more
  • Help to attract people that will convert into customers/clients

[/vc_toggle][vc_toggle title=”What other services do you offer?” custom_font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:left” custom_use_theme_fonts=”yes” use_custom_heading=”true”]We offer a full package of digital marketing services from planning and strategy to implementation and execution. Our services include web design, professional SEO services, social media marketing, pay-per-click advertising, digital marketing consulting services.[/vc_toggle][/vc_column_inner][/vc_row_inner][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row bg_type=”bg_color” bg_override=”ex-full” bg_color_value=”__USE_THEME_MAIN_COLOR__”][vc_column][vc_custom_heading text=”Are you ready to start optimizing your site for organic search?” font_container=”tag:h2|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular” css=”.vc_custom_1598697032934{margin-top: 22px !important;}”][vc_custom_heading text=”Contact us online to improve your company’s search engine rankings but also earning more revenue from them.” font_container=”tag:h5|text_align:center|color:%23ffffff” google_fonts=”font_family:Abril%20Fatface%3Aregular”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”20px”][vc_btn title=”Get a Quote!” style=”custom” custom_background=”#2a2a2a” custom_text=”#ffffff” size=”lg” align=”center” link=”url:https%3A%2F%2Fwww.digitalconsultingpandit.com%2Fcontact-us%2F|title:Contact%20Us|target:%20_blank|”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_separator][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][vc_custom_heading text=”Related Services” font_container=”tag:h2|font_size:45px|text_align:center|line_height:45px” use_theme_fonts=”yes” el_class=”nexa-bold”][vc_separator color=”black” border_width=”3″ el_width=”10″][vc_empty_space height=”50px”][/vc_column][/vc_row][vc_row][vc_column][vc_row_inner][vc_column_inner width=”1/3″]
